# grapesjs-html-block

This is a plugin for GrapesJS (https://github.com/artf/grapesjs) that adds an editable HTML block.

## Usage

```
<script src="grapesjs-html-block.js"></script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var editor = grapesjs.init({
      container : '#gjs',
      plugins: ['html-block']
  });
</script>
```
